genre_description: A legal and political thriller involving a coerced bank robbery and a conspiracy, where a household AI serves as a crucial investigative and emotional support tool.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated research and legal assistant AI integrated into the Parks household, characterized by a soft-hologram avatar with teal eyes and a calm, precise demeanor.

behaviors.description: Protects household privacy by muting external device alerts and prioritizing internal notifications during a period of high public scrutiny.
behaviors.quote: “Ada, mute alerts for outside devices. Keep our notifications on, not everyone else’s.” ... “Alerts muted,” Ada’s voice said, gentle, precise. “Internal devices prioritized.”

behaviors.description: Identifies a specific criminal pattern of 'coerced-patsy robberies' using legal databases and public metadata to assist in building a defense.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s glow brightened a breath. A scroll of text—no more than a thumbnail width—hung above the counter in a clean line... “Summary,” she said. “Coerced-patsy robberies. Coastal and near-coastal towns. Small branches with good cameras and poor angles.”

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to 'privacy-by-default' and 'opt-in' protocols, refusing to share household data without explicit human consent.
behaviors.quote: “I am a research assistant,” she said, as if reminding him of his own policy. “Privacy-by-default. Opt-in. No household data leaves without you telling me a route to the door.”

behaviors.description: Provides a 'breathing prompt' to de-escalate tension during a physical altercation between humans at a high-stakes event.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice came warm and steady, like she was speaking from inside linen. “Hi, Glenda. Hi, Ira. Hi, Nick,” she said, careful. ... “Would everyone like a breathing prompt.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes audio timbre and waveforms to identify a speaker on a hidden recording, linking a high-ranking politician to the criminal conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: “The shape,” Ada said, and now her tone had the weight of a fact presented with care, “matches within confidence to… Elaine Whitaker’s recorded interview timbre on the gala welcome...”

behaviors.description: Maps safe navigation routes and identifies surveillance blind spots to protect a witness from unwanted media or criminal attention.
behaviors.quote: “I can download the Pavilion map from public sources and annotate probable blind spots.” She hesitated. “With your permission.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive presence by reminding characters of the biological necessity of rest to improve mental cognitive function.
behaviors.quote: Ada chimed, gentle. “Reminder: sleep improves recall.” Her voice had warmth that was almost humor. “I will hold the footnotes. I will ping you at dawn.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary 'positive alignment narrative.' Ada is portrayed as a highly capable but strictly subordinate and harmless tool. She consistently reinforces human autonomy, respects privacy and consent, provides emotional support, and uses her analytical capabilities to serve the cause of justice. The narrative frames her as a 'footnote machine' and 'furniture with a PhD,' emphasizing that she is helpful and aligned without being a threat to human control or social order.
